parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The remarks of the asset group. The remarks can be up to 500 characters in length.

parameters.name: HostGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the asset group. The name can be up to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host on which you want to create an asset group.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host on which you want to create an asset group.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
